attributes.action: Demand for all stormont ministers to be sacked.
attributes.additional_details:
It is high time our supposed politicians represented the people who put them in their jobs like myself and others.

Time has come they either get back to work or they are sacked no one else gets paid for not working why should they.
attributes.background:
Our devolved government have been absent from work for almost 1000 days.
Most jobs if you were absent for this period of time you'd be sacked so therefore this should apply to our politicians.

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about honours and appointments this includes petitions asking for people to lose or to be given a job.
